abstract: Tigers Manager Jim Leyland said he would have to wait for designated hitter Victor Martinez to arrive at the stadium before deciding whether he can play Wednesday.
snippet: Tigers Manager Jim Leyland said he would have to wait for designated hitter Victor Martinez to arrive at the stadium before deciding whether he can play Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT - A misty rain was falling at Comerica Park three hours before the scheduled first pitch of Game 4 of the American League Championship Series, but Tigers Manager Jim Leyland had more pressing matters on his mind.

headline.main: Rain Returns, but Will Victor Martinez?
